title: ‘Jonas Vingegaard Is Favorite for the Tour de France’ Insists Boss of Tadej Pogacar, UAE Emirates
content:
Mind games begin as UAE top staffer deflects pressure from Giro d'Italia winner Pogačar and his assault on the grand tour double.

Read the full article at ‘Jonas Vingegaard Is Favorite for the Tour de France’ Insists Boss of Tadej Pogacar, UAE Emirates on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
